title: Teriyaki Yellowtail (Buri No Teriyaki)
servings: Serves 4 as part of a larger meal
directions: Pat the yellowtail fillets dry with a paper towel, then season lightly with salt and set aside.
Whisk together the sake, mirin, soy sauce, and sugar in a bowl.
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat and coat with vegetable oil. Add the yellowtail fillets and cook until golden brown on the first side, about 2 minutes. Flip and cook for 1 more minute.
Add the sauce mixture to the pan and cook for about 3 minutes, flipping fillets occasionally to coat them, until the fish is cooked through and the sauce is beginning to get syrupy.
Transfer the fillets to a plate, top with sauce, and serve with steamed rice.
